      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      bank_package.RealBank getRealBank()
      getRealBank() Used to access current bank information, and the bank data most recently loaded from file.
      void printAllAccountInformation()
      printAllAccountInformation() prints all information concerning ACCOUNTS ONLY to the console.
      void printAllCustomerInformation()
      printAllCustomerInformation prints all customer information to the console.
      void readAllBankDataFromFile()
      realAllBankDataFromFile() reads bank information from a file called "bankData.txt" located in the project directory (Bank_App) using an object input stream.

      saveAllBankDataToFile saves the current RealBank object to a file named bankData.txt in the user's current directory using an object output stream.

      setRealBank sets the current RealBank object to the new instance.
      void writeAccountInformationToFile()
      writeAccountInformationToFile() writes the current RealBank object's ACCOUNT information to a txt file in a format legible by humans
      void writeCustomerAndAccountInformationToFile()
      writeCustomerAndAccountInformationToFile writes BOTH the customer and the customer's account formation to a file using nested hashtable enumerations.
      void writeCustomerInformationToFile()
      writeCustomerInformationToFile() writes the current RealBank object's CUSTOMER information to a file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataIO

        public DataIO()

    • Method Detail

      • writeCustomerAndAccountInformationToFile

        public void writeCustomerAndAccountInformationToFile()
        writeCustomerAndAccountInformationToFile writes BOTH the customer and the customer's account formation to a file using nested hashtable enumerations. when a customer is printed, the method will print all of the accounts associated with that particular customer when the method has printed all the accounts associated with that customer, we will move on to the next customer

      • printAllCustomerInformation

        public void printAllCustomerInformation()
        printAllCustomerInformation prints all customer information to the console.

      • printAllAccountInformation

        public void printAllAccountInformation()
        printAllAccountInformation() prints all information concerning ACCOUNTS ONLY to the console. will contain information related to the user associated with the account, but will only print out accounts on file.

      • writeCustomerInformationToFile

        public void writeCustomerInformationToFile()
        writeCustomerInformationToFile() writes the current RealBank object's CUSTOMER information to a file. does not print account information

      • writeAccountInformationToFile

        public void writeAccountInformationToFile()
        writeAccountInformationToFile() writes the current RealBank object's ACCOUNT information to a txt file in a format legible by humans

      • saveAllBankDataToFile

        public void saveAllBankDataToFile(bank_package.RealBank newRealBank)
        saveAllBankDataToFile saves the current RealBank object to a file named bankData.txt in the user's current directory using an object output stream. the File output stream and object output stream are closed when they are done.
        Parameters:
        newRealBank - to be saved, useful for passing and saving the most current bank

      • readAllBankDataFromFile

        public void readAllBankDataFromFile()
        realAllBankDataFromFile() reads bank information from a file called "bankData.txt" located in the project directory (Bank_App) using an object input stream. sets current RealBank object to the new type case object read from the file.

      • getRealBank

        public bank_package.RealBank getRealBank()
        getRealBank() Used to access current bank information, and the bank data most recently loaded from file.
        Returns:
        current RealBank object or a temporary if current RealBank is null.

      • setRealBank

        public void setRealBank(bank_package.RealBank newRealBank)
        setRealBank sets the current RealBank object to the new instance. used when the bank has been updated and is no longer current
        Parameters:
        newRealBank - most current realBank object to be used for information printing and retrieval
